member.name: D3D10_BUFFER_SRV
member.summary: Specifies the elements in a buffer resource to use in a shader-resource view.

member.name: D3D10_BUFFER_SRV.FirstElement
member.summary: Number of bytes between the beginning of the buffer and the first element to access.

member.name: D3D10_BUFFER_SRV.ElementOffset
member.summary: The offset of the first element in the view to access, relative to element 0.

member.name: D3D10_BUFFER_SRV.NumElements
member.summary: The total number of elements in the view.

member.name: D3D10_BUFFER_SRV.ElementWidth
member.summary: The width of each element (in bytes). This can be determined from the format stored in the shader-resource-view description.
